reviewText: I needed a new copy of this as my old VHS tape finally died. I wish they had issued it in dvd but it is a great workout video and doesn't ever stress me out. Item arrived in a timely fashion and in good condition.
This video is great, the ladies are awesome. I'll think you will love watching this video, even though its from the 90's. I think it will help you get in shape.

The reason I didn't rate this higher is because I was actually unable to watch it.  I meant to buy only DVDs but erred on this purchase.  It was so inexpensive it wasn't worth returning, and the error was mine anyway.  That being said, I have always had good luck with products stamped with the Good Housekeeping seal of approval.

I've used this video for years until I've worn it out.
The pace is great with the directions being very simple.  The ladies in the video look just like  everyday people so that you don't feel overwhelmed.  I combine this program with walking for 30 min  every other day and am able to lose 1 to 2 pounds a week on this.
